attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A young man in Afghanistan has been sentenced to death by their goverment for reading and downloading info about womens rights.
Our goverment is sending troops out there to keep the goverment in power after kicking out a vicous taliban goverment.but why are our boys dying to keep a goverment in power who are just as vicious,
please help this young man,,who we would be proud of in the UK,and bring home our troops who are dying for nothing,,,you cant say its for freedom and democracy now.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
